text: HPCVL is the High Performance Computing Virtual Laboratory, a consortium of 5 universities and 3 colleges providing high performance computing to researchers at these institutions and across Canada. They include Queen's University, Royal Military College of Canada, University of Ottawa, Carleton University, Ryerson University, Loyalist College, St. Lawrence College, Ontario, and Seneca College. HPCVL is a member of Compute Canada, a national platform for dynamic resources, and includes the following consortia: * CLUMEQ * SHARCNET * WestGrid * SCinet * ACEnet ==References== *Article about HPCVL ==External links== * Category:Scientific organizations based in Canada
title: High Performance Computing Virtual Laboratory
